name: Auto Layout Columns Authoring Template
description:
This is a modernized column component with animated background loop.


  • Adaptive to any width and height
  • Works with and without article thumbnail image
  • Author profile placeholder image included
  • Article heading automatically shows in max 2 lines.
  • Article description automatically shows in max 5 lines.
  • Date will be formatted to MMM DD if the article belongs to current year. MMM DD, YYYY will be the format of the articles from past years.
  • Read time is calculated automatically with the count of words in the article and rounded to 1, 2, 3, ..., 30 minutes.
  • Articles can be filters out by tapping on Date or Read time or by Author.
